data.title: Request a validation
data.meta_description: This endpoint allows you to request a validation of the Tax Identification Number. In order to do so, our system needs a country of the client (ISO code) and a tax identification number of the client.
data.text: This endpoint allows you to request a validation of the Tax Identification Number. In order to do so, our system needs a country of the client (ISO code) and a tax identification number of the client.
